summary: This mod adds Vector Hyllus (based off the SWTOR character), an Imperial swordsman to the Silverblood Inn in Markarth.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Vector Hyllus Follower[/size][/color][/font]


[font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]This mod adds Vector Hyllus (based off the SWTOR character), an Imperial swordsman to the Silverblood Inn in Markarth.[/size][/color][/font][font=Times New Roman]
[/font]
[size=4][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]He is more or less standalone despite the need for 'RDO' (Relationship Dialogue Overhaul) because of his unique voice type (MaleElfHaughty).

[/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]Please refer to the 'instructions' readme and the required mods section to find out what you will need for this mod to work. [/color][/font][/size]
[font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Features:[/size][/color][/font][list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Lightfoot (will not set off traps)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Essential (cannot be killed)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Marriageable (testing)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Hearthfires steward & housecarl (testing)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Unique weapons & armor with enchantments[/size][/color][/font]
[/list]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Credits [/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Big thanks goes to [/size][/color][/font][list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]Kalilies[/url]﻿ & Stealthic for the KS Hairdo's Renewal[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/]Cloudedtruth[/url]﻿ for Relationship Dialogue Overhaul[/size][/color][/font]
[/list][font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font]
author: AedanStarfang
